name: Die on Four
description:
A platformer turned on its head. Every jump rolls a die, and if it lands on 4, it   goes straight for your character. Not only do you need to reach the finish line, you need to find cover wherever you can! And try your best not to jump too much.

Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and R to completely restart the game.

Ian Blevins created the art and was in charge of game and level design.

Joe Jerome came up with the main concept and helped with QA.

Justin implemented everything and wrote the code.

Created for the GMTK 22 Game Jam
